title: Repository Maintainer Operations and Release Management
description: Advanced GitHub workflows for project maintainers including issue triage, code review, and release publishing

steps.description: Triage incoming issues with labels and assignment
steps.expected_output:
#234  Login fails on Safari     (bug)
#231  Memory leak in dashboard  (bug)
#228  API timeout errors        (bug)
steps.technical_detail: Filter by label to focus on specific issue types for batch processing

steps.description: Review and add priority labels to critical bugs
steps.expected_output:
✓ Edited issue #234
  Added labels: priority:high
  Added assignees: maintainer-user
steps.technical_detail: Label hierarchy (priority:high, priority:medium, priority:low) helps team focus

steps.description: Review open pull requests requiring attention
steps.technical_detail: JSON format enables scripting and automation of review workflows

steps.description: Checkout PR locally for detailed code review
steps.expected_output:
remote: Enumerating objects: 25, done.
Switched to branch 'contributor1-dark-mode'
Branch 'contributor1-dark-mode' set up to track remote branch.
steps.technical_detail: Creates local branch tracking the PR for testing and review

steps.description: Run tests locally to verify PR quality
steps.expected_output:
PASS  src/components/Theme.test.js
PASS  src/utils/darkMode.test.js

Test Suites: 12 passed, 12 total
Tests:       48 passed, 48 total
steps.technical_detail: Local testing complements CI to catch environment-specific issues

steps.command: gh pr review 456 --request-changes --body 'Great work! Please add TypeScript types to the new functions. See inline comments for details.'
steps.expected_output:
✓ Review submitted for pull request #456
  Status: Changes requested
steps.technical_detail: Request changes blocks merging until contributor addresses feedback
New commits appear in the commits array after contributor pushes updates

steps.command: gh pr review 456 --approve --body 'LGTM! TypeScript types look great. Thanks for the quick turnaround.'
steps.expected_output:
✓ Review submitted for pull request #456
  Status: Approved
steps.technical_detail: Approval unblocks merging if branch protection requires reviews

steps.description: Merge approved PR and trigger deployment
steps.expected_output:
✓ Merged pull request #456 (Add dark mode)
✓ Deleted branch contributor1-dark-mode
✓ Deploy to Prod workflow triggered
steps.technical_detail: Standard merge preserves full commit history for feature tracking

steps.description: Create release with changelog after merging features
steps.command:
gh release create v2.5.0 --title 'Version 2.5.0 - Dark Mode Support' --notes 'New Features:
- Dark mode theme (#456)
- Improved accessibility

Bug Fixes:
- Safari login issues (#234)
- Memory leak fixes (#231)' --target main

impact: Established maintainer workflow covering issue triage, thorough code review, and professional release management
